hjz_zork

Enum GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GameState>
      • hjz_zork.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GameState>

     enum GameState
extends java.lang.Enum<GameState>
    An enum singleton representing the game's state.
    Version:
    1.0, 11/09/2016
    Author:
    Hollis Pultz, John Pruchnic, Zachary Zwierko

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INSTANCE
      The singleton instance of this GameState.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Dungeon dungeon
      The dungeon associated with this GameState.
      private boolean running
      Flag for if the game is still running.
      private boolean verbose
      Flag for if the game is running in verbose mode.

      • getItem

        Item getItem(java.lang.String name,
             boolean searchRoom)
      throws Item.NoItemException
        Search for an item in the player's inventory and possibly in their vicinity.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item to get.
        searchRoom - Flag for if their vicinity should be searched as well.
        Returns:
        The found item named name.
        Throws:
        Item.NoItemException - If an item by name name could not be found.
